ISSUE.TITLE: Refactoring of registration of TypeConverter
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: See "GetNopCustomTypeConverter" method of \Libraries\Nop.Core\CommonHelper.cs Actually it was done because of medium trust limitation. Now it's just not supported by asp.net. We can use the following code: TypeDescriptor.AddAttributes(typeof(List<int>), new TypeConverterAttribute(typeof(GenericListTypeConverter<int>)));
